item.title: Cinematic Presence: The Director’s Cut of the Jason Bergh Experience
item.content:encoded: This is Brooklyn grit in a darkroom palette—italicized first letters, cream-toned “film stock” whites, and UI details pulled straight from the edge of a 35mm strip.

item.title: Creating a Smooth Horizontal Parallax Gallery: From DOM to WebGL
item.content:encoded: Build a smooth horizontal parallax gallery in DOM/CSS/JS, then upgrade it to GPU-powered WebGL (Three.js) with shaders.

item.title: Joffrey Spitzer Portfolio: A Minimalist Astro + GSAP Build with Reveals, Flip Transitions and Subtle Motion
item.content:encoded: Building a minimalist, smooth portfolio with Astro + GSAP: reveals, page transitions and subtle animations, crafted with restraint and precision.

item.title: Reactive Depth: Building a Scroll-Driven 3D Image Tube with React Three Fiber
item.content:encoded: Build a scroll-driven, infinitely looping 3D image tube in React Three Fiber powered by shaders, inertia, and a unified motion system.

item.title: Inside Metalab, Silicon Valley’s Best-Kept Design Secret
item.content:encoded: You may not have known it at the time, but chances are you've probably used a product we've designed.

item.title: 1820 Productions: Minimal Design, Maximal Motion
item.content:encoded: A detailed behind-the-build on turning a strict minimal brief into a high-end experience through rhythm, transitions, and micro-interactions.

item.title: Jordan Gilroy: From Burnout to Building the Work I Always Wanted
item.content:encoded: How learning to build my own work helped me take back control and fall in love with design again.

item.title: Building an Endless Procedural Snake with Three.js and WebGL
item.content:encoded: A deep dive into building a GPU-enhanced procedural curve system in Three.js, where organic motion emerges from simple steering rules and endless Bézier paths.

item.title: Exo Ape: Crafting Unforgettable Digital Journeys
item.content:encoded: A studio story shaped by narrative, motion, and the belief that digital journeys should feel human.

item.title: Motion Highlights #16
item.content:encoded: A fresh selection of UI animations and motion work from the creative community.
